member.name: T:System.Buffers.Binary.BinaryPrimitives
member.summary: Reads bytes as primitives with specific endianness.

member.name: M:System.Buffers.Binary.BinaryPrimitives.ReadInt16BigEndian(System.SpanByte)
member.summary: Reads an System.Int16 from the beginning of a read-only span of bytes, as big endian.
member.param: The read-only span to read.
member.exception: source is too small to contain an System.Int16.
